Articles.Content:
0.17 is almost here

I have gathered up plenty of information and said by Nova a few days ago i can now tell u that these planets im about to show u are official!

Here is a picture of the new planets. What they look like.. And were there positions are in the Kerbal System. I did not draw/make this picture... this was taken by Nova so this is 100% real 0.17 screenshot form him Except the pictures of the planets i out in.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32410[/ATTACH]

Feel free to talk about these new planets. How u will get to them and etc....

Click on the Picture to see it better

Edited September 3, 2012 by cocomoe1002
Sweet. more places to get kerbals "accidently" stuck around
*slowpoke.jepg* did you honestly really need to make a thread about this? almost everyone already knows about the new planets and most discussion about them is in the unofficial .17 discussion thread
i will just make a Dalek flying saucer craft that disobeys gravity or something
I see that you have used the exact images from my Kerbol Solar system picture.
This makes me moist. To hell with everything else i have to do.

I see that you have used the exact images from my Kerbol Solar system picture.

Holy crap you're right. He didn't even bother using the full sized ones and just used your images.
It's not exactly "official" if you don't work for Squad cocomoe1002, and you pinched someone else's annotated pic, plus this thread is going nowhere, so I'm closing it
